00002 // Structure.h
00003 //
00004 // Implements the vtStructure class which represents a single built structure.

00006 // Copyright (c) 2001 Virtual Terrain Project
00007 // Free for all uses, see license.txt for details.
00008 //
00009 
00010 #ifndef STRUCTUREH
00011 #define STRUCTUREH
00012 
00013 #include "vtdata/MathTypes.h"
00014 #include "Selectable.h"
00015 
00016 class vtBuilding;
00017 class vtFence;
00018 
00019 enum vtStructureType
00020 {
00021     ST_BUILDING,
00022     ST_FENCE,
00023     ST_WALL,
00024     ST_INSTANCE
00025 };
00026 
00027 class vtStructure : public Selectable
00028 {
00029 public:
00030     vtStructure() {}
00031 
00032     void SetBuilding(vtBuilding *bld) { m_pBuilding = bld; m_type = ST_BUILDING; }
00033     void SetFence(vtFence *fen) { m_pFence = fen; m_type = ST_FENCE; }
00034 
00035     vtStructureType GetType() { return m_type; }
00036     vtBuilding *GetBuilding() { if (m_type == ST_BUILDING) return m_pBuilding; else return NULL; }
00037     vtFence *GetFence() { if (m_type == ST_FENCE) return m_pFence; else return NULL; }
00038 
00039     virtual bool GetExtents(DRECT &rect);
00040 
00041 protected:
00042     union {
00043         vtBuilding *m_pBuilding;
00044         vtFence *m_pFence;
00045     };
00046     vtStructureType m_type;
00047 };
00048 
00049 #endif // STRUCTUREH
